title: India drafts rules to regulate Uber, other ride-hailing firms
text:
Published By: Reuters - Technology - Today 
NEW DELHI (Reuters) - India has drafted guidelines to regulate ride-hailing companies, including U.S.-based Uber [UBER.UL] and its domestic ...
